Whatever disagreements are between this universe and theirs are none of my business. I'll tell you exactly what I told them.
Is this really the best that we can do? Did the Universe labor for nearly 14 billion years only to bring forth a species that will end up as an enemy to life itself and to its own home?
Well, it's not completely hopeless for you. I'm not even in the same universe... as those creatures back there.
